messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] What do you do when.....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/15/2003 7:39:11 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... help Jalen when he fusses. He s really a neat guy, in spite of the warped sense of humor.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/15/2003 7:39:11 PM Eastern Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:
>>He's been sitting and helping Jared with his reading, and swooping down to
help Jalen when he fusses. He's really a neat guy, in spite of the warped
sense of humor. In that deparment he's quite sick in the head. hehe

Ren<<
*****************************************************
Oh boy Ren, this is my son too. I think there is just something very cool
about his wierdness,...like there's this deep, very unique crazy talent that
people like Jack Black or Jim Carrey or Chris Kattan (sp) have. My son can also
do spot-on impressions of people and their voices. More than once I've
yelled, "Who's messing with so-and-so" thinking Michael, or Kelsey were yelling
cause he was tickling them or wrestling them. It turned out it was CJ imitating
them. He can also do many foreign accents...LOL...and can do entire scenes
from movies word for word. He's often dancing through the store or walking funny
when I'm with him. He can almost never just give a straight answer for
something. He's 15, BTW.

Thank God he's never been in school.....I KNOW he would have been labled ADHD
or Hyper, or something!

Nancy B. in WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: What do you do when.....
messages.msgSnippet: Oh boy, can I relate. Trevor is going to be 14 in just over a
messages.messageBody:
<<You suddenly realize that your little one is very
big and mature, and
very,
very grown up?>>

Oh boy, can I relate.
Trevor is going to be 14 in just over a month. We have these really interesting conversations now, about spirituality and family and ideas....very cool. He called me at work Thursday night and said "Mom, I'm doing laundry and I need to know if the big blanket and that rug can go in the same load."
Well drop my drawers! He's choosing to do laundry with no adults present? :) Cool again.
He's been sitting and helping Jared with his reading, and swooping down to help Jalen when he fusses. He's really a neat guy, in spite of the warped sense of humor. In that deparment he's quite sick in the head. hehe

Ren
